titleStmt.title: Instructions for the vse of the beades conteining many matters of meditacion or mentall prayer, vvith diuerse good aduises of ghostly counsayle. VVere vnto is added a figure or forme of the beades portrued in a table. Compiled by Iohn Bucke for the benefit of vnlearned. And dedicated to the honorable good lady, Anne Lady Hungarforde, sister to the duchesse of Ferria.
titleStmt.author: Bucke, John.

publicationStmt.date: in the yere of our Lorde. 1589.

notesStmt.note: Includes at end a large foldout table.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
